Package com.visionspace.taskmanager

Task Manager public API. See TaskManager for the API to submit tasks, RunnableTask for the API to implement task behavior.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    RunnableTask
    Interface tasks must implement in order to be executed by the task manager.
    TaskDescriptor
    Task descriptor interface.
    TaskHandle
    Provides a "window" over an existing task, allowing to obtain its properties and current state and to perform actions on it.
    TaskManager
    Task manager API.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    LocalTaskManagerTest
    Unit tests for the TaskManager implementation of the TaskManager interface that is returned by the TaskManagerFactory.
    TaskManagerFactory
    Entry point class for instantiating task managers.
    TaskManagerTest
    Tests to check that a given TaskManager instance implements the interface contract.
    TaskStateInfo
    Task mutable attributes, their value changes whenever tasks change state.
    TestUtil
    Utility methods for test classes.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    TaskState
    Possible task states.
